name: Bee Game (Netal)
description:
A bee vigilante causes tonnes of property damage in this climate change related rougelike-ish game!

Pollinate as much of the area as possible whilst destroying all the factories that stand in your way with your private apiarian army.

Controls
  • WASD / LeftJoystick - Move Queen Bee
  • Mouse / Right Joystick - Swarm Target
  • Space / Ⓐ / Shoulder Buttons - Dash
  • Escape / Start - Pause
Credits

A Netal game:

Coding, Art - Nettakrim 
Music, Art - The Other Guy
Playtesting - Walex
